metadata.synopsis: Boss Friol finds that most of her men are dead, and decides against attacking the Guild.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_ATeleport to:S_LOW_Guildhall_Entrancea78a0b7b-489a-4743-9e6e-4c88f24cc2caKill most of the Zhent and then ReCon:oe Debug_Guildhall_ZhentBetrayal

0.speaker: Boss Friol
0.text: Stlarning shit. What happened to my soldiers? Can't pull this off with this few...
0.context: NodeContext: All her soldiers have been killed before she can pull the ambush on NineFingers she was planning. Quiet frustration, panic.
